attributes.action: Recall the budget and abandon the mini budget
attributes.additional_details:
Home owners and tax payers shouldn’t be forced to pay for energy companies profits and bankers bonuses.

Millions have already been driven into poverty and now more hard working home owners are paying for the ideology of two members of parliament who have ignored the advice of experts far and wide.
attributes.background: We want the government to abandon the mini budget and re-install confidence in the market.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623684
